name: Marble Run
description:
Marble runs are a fun hobby that has captured the hearts of people of all
ages all over the world. Now this game is available to everyone. Develop
spatial thinking by constructing 3D runs and mazes for a marble in this
marble run simulation game.

Create runs in any shape by combining wooden and metallic parts. Use lifts,
vents, and other mechanisms to make your runs cyclical. Share your designs
with your friends. Test and evaluate other players' runs. Have a blast and
enjoy the enchanting magic of marble runs.
